com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.scenes

Class SceneMainGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.scenes.SceneMainGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scene

    public class SceneMainGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scene
    Represents the Main Game Scene for when the boat race starts.

      • initialize

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draws SpriteBatch on display along with updating player camera and player overlay Using BoatRace.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Scene
        Parameters:
        batch - Spritebatch passed for drawing graphic objects onto screen.

      • update

        public int update()
        Calls main runStep method for BoatRace which is repeatedly called for updating the game state.

        The BoatRace runStep method checks for started or finished boats in a leg, calls update methods for the movements for player boat and AI boats obstacles as well as checking for collisions.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Scene
        Returns:
        the scene_id of which screen is next (either this screen still or another)

      • resize

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        width - Integer width to be resized to
        height - Integer height to be resized to
